name: Light Breath+
description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 to adjacent allies for 1 turn after combat.

refinable.description: After combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
